title: MOS meeting with Chinese Ambassador - Press Note issued by Board of Investment
snippet:
November 30, 2019 (PPI-OT)

Following is the text of press note issued by Board of Investment
body:
Quote

Mr. Asad Umar, Federal Minister for Planning, Development and Reforms and Special Initiatives, chairing a review meeting of PSDP Projects and Special Economic Zones (SEZs) in Islamabad on Thursday, the 28th November, 2019. Mr. Qasim Raza, Executive Director General-II, Board of Investment (BoI) also present.

For more information, contact:Head Office,Board of InvestmentAtaturk Avenue, G-5/1, Islamabad, PakistanTel: +92-51-9224103Fax: +92-51-9207030Email: investpak@pakboi.gov.pkWebsite: http://invest.gov.pk

Unquote
